Hi Ron,

When composing a new email, you can enable the Composition toolbar with View -> Toolbars -> Composition Toolbar from the menu. If you don't have the menu enabled, you can open it via Alt+V (that opens the View menu).

By the way, you can also use Ctrl+Enter to send the e-mail.

Regards, Balázs
